description: InSummary connects with your calendar and automatically generates AI Powered Performance Reviews and AI Powered Status Reports that save you time.
title: InSummary - Intelligent Performance Reviews and Status Reports
introduction: InSummary is a tool that drafts self-evaluation responses, peer reviews, and weekly summaries using your calendar data. It helps users save time by providing personalized and impactful reflections and reports.
targetPeople: Professionals looking to streamline self-evaluations, peer reviews, and progress reporting

faqs.question: What does InSummary do?
faqs.answer: InSummary drafts self-evaluation responses, peer reviews, and weekly summaries using your calendar data.

faqs.question: How does InSummary help with peer reviews?
faqs.answer: It identifies colleagues you worked with on impactful projects and reminds both parties what was worked on together to write insightful peer reviews.

faqs.question: What kind of reports does InSummary provide?
faqs.answer: It provides informative and personalized weekly reports sent directly to your inbox.

faqs.question: How does InSummary categorize work streams?
faqs.answer: It automatically identifies your work streams to help you understand how you spent your time and where you should focus more.

faqs.question: Is InSummary customizable?
faqs.answer: Yes, it allows you to easily share your progress with your team and managers by copying, pasting, and tweaking the reports for better status updates.
